00028 def Plurk_Login(user_name):
00029     file = open('API_all.keys', 'r+')
00030     all_data = json.load(file)
00031     file.close()
00032     consumer_key = "8GR4shW16mNX"
00033     consumer_secret = "2DSFSK5vHEva2LsxjDYaKpISu2pYCjNy"
00034     plurk = PlurkAPI(consumer_key, consumer_secret)
00035 
00036     if all_data.get(user_name):
00037         data = all_data[user_name]
00038     else:
00039         plurk.authorize()
00040         data = {}
00041         data["ACCESS_TOKEN"] = plurk._oauth.oauth_token['oauth_token']
00042         data["ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET"] = plurk._oauth.oauth_token['oauth_token_secret']
00043         all_data[user_name] = data
00044         file = open('API_all.keys', 'w')
00045         json.dump(all_data, file)
00046         file.close()
00047 
00048     file = open('API.keys','w')
00049     json.dump(data,file)
00050     file.close()
00051     plurk.authorize(data["ACCESS_TOKEN"],data["ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET"])
00052     return plurk

00054 def Plurk_Log():
00055     file = open('API.keys', 'r+')
00056     data = json.load(file)
00057     consumer_key = "8GR4shW16mNX"
00058     consumer_secret = "2DSFSK5vHEva2LsxjDYaKpISu2pYCjNy"
00059     plurk = PlurkAPI(consumer_key, consumer_secret)
00060     if data.get('ACCESS_TOKEN'):
00061         plurk.authorize(data["ACCESS_TOKEN"],data["ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET"])
00062     else:
00063         plurk.authorize()
00064         data["ACCESS_TOKEN"] = plurk._oauth.oauth_token['oauth_token']
00065         data["ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET"] = plurk._oauth.oauth_token['oauth_token_secret']
00066     file.close()
00067     return plurk

00069 def ParseTime(d):
00070     date = d.split()
00071     Time = {}
00072     Time['day'] = int(date[1])
00073     Time['month'] = Month_dic[date[2]]
00074     Time['year'] = int(date[3])
00075     Time['week_day'] = date[0].strip(',')
00076 
00077     accurate_time = date[4].split(':')        
00078     Time['hour'] = int( accurate_time[0])
00079     Time['minute'] = int( accurate_time[1])
00080     Time['second'] = int( accurate_time[2])
00081 
00082     return Time
00083 
00084 def GetFriends(plurk):
00085     user = plurk.callAPI('/APP/Users/currUser')
00086     uid = user["id"]
00087     n = 99
00088     off_num = 0
00089     file_friend = open('FriendsList','w')
00090     while n >= 99:
00091         friends = plurk.callAPI('/APP/FriendsFans/getFriendsByOffset',{
00092                            'user_id' : uid,
00093                            'limit' : 100,
00094                            'offset' : off_num,
00095                            })
00096         for f in friends:
00097             #print f["nick_name"]
00098             file_friend.write(f['nick_name'] + '\n')
00099         n = len(friends)
00100         off_num += n+1
00101     file_friend.close()

00104 def GetTimeline(plurk):
00105     Posts = []
00106     offset = ''
00107     while len(Posts) < 100:
00108         plurks = plurk.callAPI('/APP/Timeline/getPlurks',{
00109             'offset' : offset,
00110             'limit' : 100
00111             })
00112         users = plurks["plurk_users"]
00113 
00114         if len(plurks["plurks"]) == 0:
00115             return Posts
00116 
00117         latestTime = {}
00118         for p in plurks["plurks"]:
00119             owner_id = p["owner_id"]
00120             user_info = users[str(owner_id)]
00121 
00122             if p.has_key('qualifier_translated'):
00123                 qualifier = p['qualifier_translated']
00124             else:
00125                 qualifier = p['qualifier']
00126 
00127             Time = ParseTime(p['posted'])
00128 
00129             Post = {}
00130             Post['content'] = qualifier +' : ' +  p['content']
00131             Post['id'] = str(p['plurk_id'])
00132             if user_info.has_key('nick_name'):
00133                 Post['user_name'] = user_info['nick_name']
00134             else:
00135                 Post['user_name'] = "no name"
00136             Post['time'] = Time
00137             Posts.append(Post)
00138             latestTime = Time
00139         Time = latestTime
00140         offset = '%d-%d-%dT%d:%d:%d' % (Time['year'], Time['month'], Time['day'], Time['hour'], Time['minute'], Time['second'])
00141     return Posts
00142

00144 def GetUserPlurks(plurk, user_id):
00145     Posts = []
00146     offset = ''
00147 
00148     while len(Posts) < 100:
00149         plurks = plurk.callAPI('/APP/Timeline/getPublicPlurks', {
00150                 'user_id' : user_id,
00151                 'limit'   : 200,
00152                 'offset' : offset,
00153             })
00154 
00155         if len(plurks["plurks"]) == 0:
00156             return Posts
00157         users = plurks["plurk_users"]
00158         latestTime = {}
00159         for p in plurks["plurks"]:
00160             owner_id = p["owner_id"]
00161             user_info = users[str(owner_id)]
00162             
00163             if p.has_key('qualifier_translated'):
00164                 qualifier = p['qualifier_translated']
00165             else:
00166                 qualifier = p['qualifier']
00167 
00168             Time = ParseTime(p['posted'])
00169 
00170             Post = {}
00171             Post['content'] = qualifier +' : ' +  p['content']
00172             Post['id'] = str(p['plurk_id'])
00173             if user_info.has_key('nick_name'):
00174                 Post['user_name'] = user_info['nick_name']
00175             else:
00176                 Post['user_name'] = "no name"
00177             Post['time'] = Time
00178             Posts.append(Post)
00179             latestTime = Time
00180         Time = latestTime
00181         offset = '%d-%d-%dT%d:%d:%d' % (Time['year'], Time['month'], Time['day'], Time['hour'], Time['minute'], Time['second'])
00182     return Posts

00186 def Reply(plurk, plurk_id , content):
00187     plurks = plurk.callAPI('/APP/Responses/responseAdd', {
00188         'plurk_id' : plurk_id,
00189         'content' : content.encode('utf-8'),
00190         'qualifier' : 'says'
00191         })
00192 
00193 def Favorite(plurk ,plurk_id):
00194     text = plurk.callAPI('/APP/Timeline/favoritePlurks', {
00195         'ids' : [int(plurk_id)]
00196         })
00197     return text

00200 def QueryMyTimeline(plurk, request):
00201     request = unicode(request, "utf-8")
00202     Posts = GetTimeline(plurk)
00203     new_Posts = []
00204     for p in Posts:
00205         if request in p['content']:
00206             new_Posts.append(p)
00207              
00208     return new_Posts
00209

00211 def QueryUserTimeline(plurk, user_id, request):
00212     request = unicode(request, "utf-8")
00213     Posts = GetUserPlurks(plurk, user_id)
00214     new_Posts = []
00215     for p in Posts:
00216         if request in p['content']:
00217             new_Posts.append(p)
00218              
00219     return new_Posts

00222 def Query(plurk, request):
00223     plurks = plurk.callAPI('/APP/PlurkSearch/search',{
00224                            'query' : request})
00225 
00226     users = plurks["users"]
00227     Posts = []
00228     for p in plurks["plurks"]:
00229         owner_id = p["owner_id"]
00230 
00231 
00232         user_info = users[str(owner_id)]
00233 
00234         if p.has_key('qualifier_translated'):
00235             qualifier = p['qualifier_translated']
00236         else:
00237             qualifier = p['qualifier']
00238         
00239         #print ' ' + qualifier+ ' : '
00240 
00241         Time = ParseTime(p['posted'])
00242         
00243         Post = {}
00244         Post['content'] = qualifier +' : ' + p['content']
00245         Post['id'] = str(p['plurk_id'])
00246         if user_info.has_key('nick_name'):
00247             Post['user_name'] = user_info['nick_name']
00248         else:
00249             Post['user_name'] = "no name"
00250         Post['time'] = Time
00251         Posts.append(Post)
00252     return Posts

00255 if __name__ == '__main__':
00256     try:
00257         opts, args = getopt.getopt(sys.argv[1:], "ho:v", ["help", "output="])
00258     except getopt.GetoptError, err:
00259         print str(err) # will print something like "option -a not recognized"
00260         usage()
00261         sys.exit(2)
00262 
00263     plurk = Plurk_Log()
00264     
00265     argc = len (sys.argv)
00266 
00267     if argc == 1:
00268         #do normal get time line
00269         Posts = GetTimeline(plurk)
00270         file2 = open('POST.json', 'w')
00271         output = json.dumps(Posts)
00272         file2.write(output)
00273         file2.close()
00274     if argc > 2:
00275         i = 2
00276         if cmp(sys.argv[1], 'query') == 0:
00277             my = False
00278             while i < argc:
00279                 if sys.argv[i] == '-r':
00280                     i = i + 1
00281                     request = sys.argv[i]
00282                 elif sys.argv[i] == '-u':
00283                     i = i + 1
00284                     user = sys.argv[i]
00285                 elif sys.argv[i] == '-m':
00286                     my = True
00287                 i = i + 1
00288                 
00289             if 'request' in locals() and 'user' in locals():
00290                 Posts = QueryUserTimeline(plurk, user, request)
00291             elif 'user' in locals():
00292                 Posts = GetUserPlurks(plurk, user)
00293             elif 'request' in locals() and my:
00294                 Posts = QueryMyTimeline(plurk, request)
00295             elif 'request' in locals() and not my:
00296                 Posts = Query(plurk, request)
00297 
00298             file2 = open('POST.json', 'w')
00299             output = json.dumps(Posts)
00300             file2.write(output)
00301             file2.close()
00302                 
00303         elif cmp(sys.argv[1] , 'reply') == 0:
00304             plurk_id = sys.argv[2]
00305             file3 = open('reply', 'r')
00306             content = file3.read()
00307             file3.close()
00308             Reply(plurk, int(plurk_id), unicode(content,'utf8'))
00309         elif cmp(sys.argv[1], 'like') == 0:
00310             plurk_id = sys.argv[2]
00311             Favorite(plurk ,plurk_id)
00312         elif cmp(sys.argv[1], 'login') == 0:
00313             plurk = Plurk_Login(sys.argv[2])
00314             GetFriends(plurk)
